mapper.select: select * from ( select (t.FINISH_TIME-t.EXE_TIME) as EXETIME, decode(t.STATUS,'0','成功','1','失败','2') as EXESTATUS,t.* from INTEPORTJK_RESULT_TAB t order by t.exe_time desc) a where a.id in(select max(id) from INTEPORTJK_RESULT_TAB t group by ip,port)

select * from (select rownum row_num,a.* from (select (t.FINISH_TIME-t.EXE_TIME) as EXETIME, decode(t.STATUS,'0','成功','1','失败','2') as EXESTATUS,t.* from INTEPORTJK_RESULT_TAB t where 1 = 1 order by t.exe_time desc) a where a.id in(select max(id) from INTEPORTJK_RESULT_TAB t group by ip,port)) b where b.row_num > ${start} and b.row_num <= ${end}

select count(*) from (select rownum row_num,a.* from (select (t.FINISH_TIME-t.EXE_TIME) as EXETIME, decode(t.STATUS,'0','成功','1','失败','2') as EXESTATUS,t.* from INTEPORTJK_RESULT_TAB t where 1 = 1 order by t.exe_time desc) a where a.id in(select max(id) from INTEPORTJK_RESULT_TAB t group by ip,port)) b

select * from ( select * from ( select (t.FINISH_TIME-t.EXE_TIME) as EXETIME, decode(t.STATUS,'0','成功','1','失败','2') as EXESTATUS,t.* from INTEPORTJK_RESULT_TAB t where 1=1 and t.IP =#{IP} order by t.exe_time desc) a where rownum <= 30 ) order by exe_time asc
select count(*) from INTEPORTJK_RESULT_TAB t where 1 = 1 and t.IP =#{IP,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum < 30

select * from (select rownum row_num,a.* from (select (t.FINISH_TIME-t.EXE_TIME) as EXETIME, decode(t.STATUS,'0','成功','1','失败','2') as EXESTATUS,t.* from INTEPORTJK_RESULT_TAB t where 1 = 1 and t.IP =#{IP,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by t.exe_time desc) a) b where b.row_num > ${start} and b.row_num <= ${end}
select * from t_ip_port t where t.isenable='1'

select nvl( round( avg( uf_timestamp_diff( to_timestamp(a.END_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss,ff'), to_timestamp(t.START_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss,ff') )/1000 ) ,2) ,0) time from fwzyqqbwcjb t left join fwzyxybwcjb a on t.qqbwbs=a.xybwbs where t.start_time > #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.start_time <= #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
